Html:
Hi,

I would please like to know how to change the tab order of the OK and Cancel buttons that are displayed in the dialog when a confirmation interaction request is raised?

Thanks.

Hi,

I have now defined my own child window and assigned it to PopupChildWindowAction.ChildWindow in xaml.

When I display the child window using a confirmation interaction request, I would please like to know how I can set the Confirmed property to true when the OK button is clicked?

Thanks.
